Hot_Chocolate.item_description_long: Indulge in our rich and velvety hot chocolate, topped with whipped cream. A comforting treat to warm your senses.

Margarita.item_description_long: Enjoy the classic taste of our margarita, made with top-shelf tequila, triple sec, and a hint of lime. Served on the rocks for a refreshing experience.
Margarita.ingredients: Tequila, triple sec, lime juice, salt

Iced_Coffee.item_description_long: Cool down with our delightful iced coffee, made from premium beans and served over ice. The perfect pick-me-up on a warm day.

Spinach_Artichoke_Dip.item_description_long: A creamy blend of spinach, artichokes, and melted cheese. Served with crispy tortilla chips for a delicious start to your meal.
Spinach_Artichoke_Dip.ingredients: Spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, Parmesan, tortilla chips

Chicken_Alfredo_Pasta.item_description_long: Savor the flavors of our classic chicken Alfredo pasta. Tender chicken breast in a rich Alfredo sauce, served over perfectly cooked pasta.
Chicken_Alfredo_Pasta.ingredients: Chicken breast, fettuccine pasta, Alfredo sauce, Parmesan

Chocolate_Lava_Cake.item_description_long: Indulge in the divine taste of our chocolate lava cake. A warm and gooey chocolate center, surrounded by a moist and rich cake exterior.

Chai_Latte.item_description_long: Experience the warmth of our spiced chai latte, a perfect blend of aromatic spices and steamed milk. A comforting beverage to delight your taste buds.

Caprese_Salad.item_description_long: A light and refreshing salad featuring ripe tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze.
Caprese_Salad.ingredients: Tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, balsamic glaze

Penne_Arrabiata.item_description_long: Spaghetti tossed in a spicy tomato sauce with garlic and red chili flakes, topped with fresh parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Penne_Arrabiata.ingredients: Penne pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, red chili flakes, parsley, Parmesan cheese

Classic_Cheeseburger.item_description_long: Savor the classic flavor of our juicy cheeseburger, topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce.
Classic_Cheeseburger.ingredients: Beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, sauce, bun

Margherita_Pizza.item_description_long: Enjoy the simplicity of our classic Margherita pizza, topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Margherita_Pizza.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil

Chicken_Caesar_Salad.item_description_long: A hearty Caesar salad with grilled chicken breast, crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
Chicken_Caesar_Salad.ingredients: Chicken breast, romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing

Turkey_Club_Sandwich.item_description_long: Layers of sliced turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread. Served with a side of crispy fries.
Turkey_Club_Sandwich.ingredients: Turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo, bread, fries

Filet_Mignon.item_description_long: Indulge in the exquisite flavor of our tender filet mignon, grilled to perfection and served with your choice of side.
Filet_Mignon.ingredients: Filet mignon, seasoning, side of choice

Spicy_Tuna_Roll.item_description_long: Experience the bold flavors of our spicy tuna roll, made with fresh tuna, spicy mayo, and avocado, wrapped in seaweed and rice.
Spicy_Tuna_Roll.ingredients: Fresh tuna, spicy mayo, avocado, seaweed, rice

Vegetable_Stir-Fry.item_description_long: A colorful and nutritious stir-fry featuring a variety of fresh vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce.

Tomato_Basil_Soup.item_description_long: Warm up with our homemade tomato basil soup, made with ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, and a hint of cream. Served with a side of crusty bread.
